mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.projectcode AS "projectcode", a.projectname AS "projectname", a.costype AS "costype", a.unit AS "unit", a.year AS "year", a.product AS "product", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.productrate AS "productrate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_costinfo( id, projectcode, projectname, costype, unit, year, product, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, productrate, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{projectcode}, #{projectname}, #{costype}, #{unit}, #{year}, #{product}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{productrate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_costinfo SET projectcode = #{projectcode}, projectname = #{projectname}, costype = #{costype}, unit = #{unit}, year = #{year}, product = #{product}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, productrate = #{productrate} WHERE id = #{id}
